      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

            <entry>cahi1:data_110977</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Variation of relative intensities with different radiation wavelengths</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Variante der relativen Intensität mit 
unterschiedlichen Strahlung Wellenlängen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Variation des intensités relatives avec 
différentes longueurs d'onde de rayonnement</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Variação de intensidades relativas com 
wavelengths diferentes da radiação</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Variazione delle intensità relative con 
differenti lunghezze d'onda di radiazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παραλλαγή των σχετικών εντάσεων με τα διαφορετικά 
μήκη κύματος ακτινοβολίας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Variación de intensidades relativas con diversas
longitudes de onda de la radiación</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These line graphs illustrate the relationship of relative intensities and different wavelengths of radiation at different temperatures.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">infrared spectra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Radiation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">relative intensities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Temperature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ultraviolet spectra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">visible spectra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wavelengths</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses veranschaulichen Zeile Diagramme das 
Verhältnis der relativen Intensität und der unterschiedlichen 
Wellenlängen der Strahlung bei den unterschiedlichen Temperaturen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ces graphes par ligne illustrent le rapport des 
intensités relatives et de différentes longueurs d'onde de 
rayonnement aux différentes températures.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este a linha gráficos ilustra o relacionamento 
de intensidades relativas e de wavelengths diferentes da radiação em
temperaturas diferentes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo grafici lineari illustra il rapporto delle
intensità relative e delle lunghezze d'onda differenti di radiazione 
alle temperature differenti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτές οι γραφικές παραστάσεις γραμμών επεξηγούν τη 
σχέση των σχετικών εντάσεων και των διαφορετικών μηκών κύματος 
της ακτινοβολίας στις διαφορετικές θερμοκρασίες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este la línea gráficos ilustra el lazo de 
intensidades relativas y de diversas longitudes de onda de la 
radiación en diversas temperaturas.</string>
          </description>
